text:
1658 STERLING ROAD
Charlotte 7, North Carolina
March 1, 1956
Mr. Harry Skornia
Executive Director
N A E B
llf Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
Will you please send me full particulars about
membership in I A E B?
Although not actually employed in the Television
industry at the moment I am interested in making a change
and getting into the Educational Television field in
some capacity.
Naturally I shall want to affiliate with N A E B.
LEO/lf
Laura E. Owens, Director
